desc: Wigs sale. Human hair wigs & Synthetic wigs. Buy 1 Get 1 Half Price. Dublin. The Mayfair Collection is consider to have some of the world's most luxurious wigs. We have an extensive collection of both high quality human hair and synthetic wigs.

layout.text: Our fashionable wig studio in Donnybrook is a place of comfort and relaxation for customers that are looking for either a change of hair style or have recently been diagnosed with an illness and require a wig. We also specialise in hair pieces for our clients who have either thinning hair or alopecia.
